name: Whacker of Thy Weeds
description:
You must protect your farm and precious, prized jack o' lantern from the evil weeds.
Plant and harvest pumpkins, use them to buy items to aid you from the shop. 
(For some reason itch doesn't like it when you click off the game, it won't allow you to control, it's not my fault ;-;)

CONTROLS: WSDA to move around, E to interact/use items, click to operate UI. 1 - 5 to change item slot.
